name: The Bestest Travel Companion!
description: Convert the Elemental Dice spent to Omni Element ×2.
descriptionraw: Convert the Elemental Dice spent to $[K411] ×2.
descriptionreplaced: Convert the Elemental Dice spent to <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color> ×2.
storytext: "You might be only one of countless stars, but you're Paimon's whole world!"
source: Reward for meeting the Player Manual's requirements
